climbs.name: The Little Squeeze
climbs.fa: Cooper Uliano, Piper Warren, and Kennedy Quigg

content.description: Starts with wide hands on an incut right hand sidepull and a sloping lefthand side pull. Make one hard move to pull on, reach high to the lip, and top out
content.location: First problem when you reach the Hidden Valley.Â

content.description: A small but diverse area with some short and steep boulders and low angle slabs. This area has some potential for a few very hard boulders. High rock quality with some south facing sections allow it to stay relatively clean compared to some other zones. Sun exposure is direct so it may be wise to try coming here on colder days. Otherwise beautiful and hidden area with some good potential for hard lines.
